entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -10.8°C

entry.title: Sunday: A few flurries. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Flurries. Local amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 16 this morning and minus 8 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 08:47 AM EDT Sunday 19 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 15. POP 30%
entry.summary: A few flurries ending this evening then mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 11 this evening. Forecast issued 08:47 AM EDT Sunday 19 March 2023
